SHEET-COMMANDER.meta-move: Hold CMD/Windows-key to move window under cursor
SHEET-COMMANDER.alt-move: Hold Alt to move window under cursor
SHEET-COMMANDER.ctrl-move: Hold Control to move window under cursor
SHEET-COMMANDER.shift-move: Hold Shift to move window under cursor
SHEET-COMMANDER.move-hint: If you select multiple modifier keys, they all need to be pressed for the action to trigger. If you select none, the function will be disabled.
